title: The Professor Project
description: Kayla Masters came to the University of Chicago with one goal in mind: Sleep with an older man. When she meets Professor Kane, a handsome, willing educator, she thinks her fantasy might just be fulfilled. But then, unexpectedly, Professor Pearson, a beautiful lesbian, shows up to their night of passion. Could this rendezvous turn into something hotter than Kayla had ever imagined possible? And will Kayla get the education she so eagerly seeks?This is an erotic short story of approximately 6500 words. Not suitable for those under 18.
author: Mia De Rossi
